docs.snippet: The apex predator is being fished for its delicious flesh so relentlessly that it is being pushed to the brink of extinction....

byline.original: By JANE LUBCHENCO and MARIA DAMANAKI

docs.lead_paragraph: The apex predator is being fished for its delicious flesh so relentlessly that it is being pushed to the brink of extinction.

headline.main: Plane Landing Gear Collapses on Landing in San Antonio
headline.print_headline: Plane Landing Gear Collapses on Landing in San Antonio

docs.snippet: Authorities say everyone was safely evacuated from a United Express plane after its nose gear collapsed when it landed at San Antonio International Airport....
docs.lead_paragraph: Authorities say everyone was safely evacuated from a United Express plane after its nose gear collapsed when it landed at San Antonio International Airport.

headline.main: Italian Opposition Politicians Say Renzi Should Resign Immediately
headline.print_headline: Italian Opposition Politicians Say Renzi Should Resign Immediately

docs.snippet: Italian opposition parties said Prime Minister Matteo Renzi should resign immediately after exit polls suggested he had suffered a heavy defeat in a referendum on his plans for constitutional reform....
docs.lead_paragraph: Italian opposition parties said Prime Minister Matteo Renzi should resign immediately after exit polls suggested he had suffered a heavy defeat in a referendum on his plans for constitutional reform.

headline.main: Pakistan, Russia to Sell Warplanes to Nigeria, Air Force Chief Says
headline.print_headline: Pakistan, Russia to Sell Warplanes to Nigeria, Air Force Chief Says

docs.snippet: Nigeria is expecting the arrival of warplanes and helicopters it ordered from Pakistan and Russia, its latest effort to counter terrorist and militant activities, Air Marshal Sadique Abubakar said on Sunday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Nigeria is expecting the arrival of warplanes and helicopters it ordered from Pakistan and Russia, its latest effort to counter terrorist and militant activities, Air Marshal Sadique Abubakar said on Sunday.

headline.main: Notice, Dozier Lead No. 20 South Carolina Past FIU, 70-54
headline.print_headline: Notice, Dozier Lead No. 20 South Carolina Past FIU, 70-54

docs.snippet: With leading scorer and rebounder Sindarius Thornwell out indefinitely, No. 20 South Carolina turned to Duane Notice and P.J. Dozier to fill the void on Sunday....
docs.lead_paragraph: With leading scorer and rebounder Sindarius Thornwell out indefinitely, No. 20 South Carolina turned to Duane Notice and P.J. Dozier to fill the void on Sunday.

headline.main: Oral Roberts Women Stun No. 12 Oklahoma With Late 18-0 Run
headline.print_headline: Oral Roberts Women Stun No. 12 Oklahoma With Late 18-0 Run

docs.snippet: Lakota Beatty scored 20 points, Maria Martianez had 18 points with 13 rebounds and Oral Roberts used an 18-0 run in the fourth quarter to shock No. 12 Oklahoma 74-67 on Sunday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Lakota Beatty scored 20 points, Maria Martianez had 18 points with 13 rebounds and Oral Roberts used an 18-0 run in the fourth quarter to shock No. 12 Oklahoma 74-67 on Sunday.

headline.main: Judge Orders Michigan Recount to Begin at Noon Monday
headline.print_headline: Judge Orders Michigan Recount to Begin at Noon Monday

docs.snippet: Michigan must begin its presidential recount at noon Monday, a federal judge ruled in a late-night order that could make it more likely the state will complete the count ahead of a Dec. 13 deadline....
docs.lead_paragraph: Michigan must begin its presidential recount at noon Monday, a federal judge ruled in a late-night order that could make it more likely the state will complete the count ahead of a Dec. 13 deadline.

headline.main: EU Urges U.S. Tech Giants to Act Faster Against Hate Speech
headline.print_headline: EU Urges U.S. Tech Giants to Act Faster Against Hate Speech

docs.snippet: U.S. tech giants including Facebook, Twitter, Google's YouTube and Microsoft will have to act faster to tackle online hate speech or face laws forcing them to do so, the European Commission said on Sunday....
docs.lead_paragraph: U.S. tech giants including Facebook, Twitter, Google's YouTube and Microsoft will have to act faster to tackle online hate speech or face laws forcing them to do so, the European Commission said on Sunday.

docs.snippet: In electing Alexander Van der Bellen for president, Austrians rejected the far-right ideas of his opponent, Norbert Hofer....
docs.lead_paragraph: In electing Alexander Van der Bellen for president, Austrians rejected the far-right ideas of his opponent, Norbert Hofer.

headline.main: Jaye Marie Green Wins LPGA Tour Q-School
headline.print_headline: Jaye Marie Green Wins LPGA Tour Q-School

docs.snippet: Jaye Marie Green won the LPGA Tour qualifying tournament Sunday to top the 20 card-earners, making a 20-foot birdie putt on the final hole for a one-stroke victory....
docs.lead_paragraph: Jaye Marie Green won the LPGA Tour qualifying tournament Sunday to top the 20 card-earners, making a 20-foot birdie putt on the final hole for a one-stroke victory.
